about.description:
stochatreat is a Python module to employ block randomization using pandas.
Mainly thought with RCTs in mind, it also works for any other scenario in
where you would like to randomly allocate treatment within blocks or strata.
about.summary: Python module for block randomization using pandas

about.description:
stochatreat is a Python module to employ block randomization using pandas.
Mainly thought with RCTs in mind, it also works for any other scenario in
where you would like to randomly allocate treatment within blocks or strata.
about.summary: Python module for block randomization using pandas

name: stochatreat
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "stochatreat" %}
{% set version = "0.0.16" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 534e181fb9795d2450276740f54f4b8dad1d417cac39ed7fcffbe9c7693dfa1a
build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.6
    - pip
    - setuptools
    - pandas
    - numpy
  run:
    - python >=3.6
    - pip
    - setuptools
    - pandas
    - numpy

test:
  imports:
    - stochatreat

about:
  home: http://github.com/manmartgarc/stochatreat
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Python module for block randomization using pandas

  description: |
    stochatreat is a Python module to employ block randomization using pandas.
    Mainly thought with RCTs in mind, it also works for any other scenario in
    where you would like to randomly allocate treatment within blocks or strata.
  dev_url: https://github.com/manmartgarc/stochatreat

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - manmartgarc
    - royalts
